WorkflowInfo.Name: Create Volume with NFS Access
WorkflowInfo.Description: Creates an export policy with a volume and a rule and assigns the volume the new policy.
WorkflowInfo.Details:
Information
This workflow creates an export policy with a volume and a rule and assigns the volume the new policy. This workflow should be triggered by a Self Service request.

Requirements:
* NetApp module is configured and Up.

Input Variables (variables recieved from the Self Service request):
* NetApp Cluster
* Vserver
* Policy Name
* Volume Name
* Aggregate
* Volume Size
* Client Match

Output
Success / Failure notice.

TimeInSeconds="0" Description="Create Export Policy" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" Vserver="%Vserver%" x:Name="NetAppCreateExportPolicy1" PolicyName="%PolicyName%" /><ns1:NetAppCreateBasicVolume TypeName="NetAppCreateBasicVolume" HostId="-2" SelectedModuleType="23" HostName="%NetAppCluster%" SelectedModuleID="9" Timeout="00:01:00" Password="" x:Name="netAppCreateBasicVolume1" DisplayName="NetApp Create Basic Volume" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" SelectedModuleName="NetApp" TimeInSeconds="0" Description="Create a new volume with basic settings" IsValid="True" SizeMb="%VolumeSize%" Vserver="%Vserver%" Aggregate="%Aggr%" ExportPolicy="%PolicyName%" Username="" VolumeType="rw" VolumeName="%VolumeName%" /><ns2:NetAppCreateExportRule TypeName="NetAppCreateExportRule" HostId="-2" SelectedModuleType="23" HostName="%NetAppCluster%" SelectedModuleID="9" Username="" RoRule="any" Password="" DisplayName="NetApp Create Export Rule" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" SelectedModuleName="NetApp" TimeInSeconds="0" Description="Create Export Rule" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" Vserver="%Vserver%" x:Name="NetAppCreateExportRule1"
